songs.title: Be Like Gucci
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Paint job color soda
Pour a four, a cola
Park and then I roll up
This is what I told ‘em
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up

[Hook]
Paint job color soda
Pour a four, a cola
Park and then I roll up
This is what I told ‘em
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up

[Verse 1]
Young and ambitious when I’m full of ambition, ‘bout to get it
Bumping Wilt Cham’ number six in the high school gym behind the bleachers
Like ay, OK, I’m OJ, I just want shine and then get paid
So I told my teachers fuck everything that they teachin’
I heard Gucci sold some work, that’s all I needed
Flip flop color paint job
Pull up then my car stop
East Atlanta Santa playing every time my car parked
Libra like a car lot
Smoking Waka Flocka Flame
Blunt yelling out Brick Squad
I’m yelling out Brick Squad
1017, pouring frozen lean
Sippin' OJ, Juice, Promethazine
And if you from the fuckin' 6
I know you know what I mean, yeah

[Hook]
Paint job color soda
Pour a four, a cola
Park and then I roll up
This is what I told ‘em
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up

[Hook]
Paint job color soda
Pour a four, a cola
Park and then I roll up
This is what I told ‘em
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up
All I want to do is be like Gucci when I grow up
